title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set
OB: An error is shown. The user interface should not perform validation as per the template requirements.
EB: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set. To reproduce: 1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset. 2. Try creating a new table group. The user should be able to go and define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
SR: 1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset. 2. Try creating a new table group. The group dialog should be shown.
